name: Keep Him Out
description:
Keep Him Out is a PSX style survival horror game set in an isolated farmhouse. You must survive a home invasion by keeping hidden and restoring power in order to call the police. You must listen carefully to your surroundings to avoid being spotted - the game requires you to hunt various items which are hidden in random locations, making each game different and just as challenging. The game is underpinned by a pathfinding AI that hunts you around the map. It understands the layout of the house and you must outsmart it in order to evade it.

I'm a 17-year-old finishing my first ever game, and seeing it come to life has been awesome. I hope it is as enjoyable to play as it was to make. 

You can contact me at cowboytoadteam@gmail.com - I'd love to hear feedback or suggestions for bugfixes. Alternatively, comment on this page. Hope you enjoy!
